name: Pi.Alert
short_description: Network scanner that detects devices, alerts on new connections, and tracks device history.
description: Pi.Alert is a powerful network monitoring tool that continuously scans your network to detect all connected devices. It builds a database of all devices by MAC address, hostname, and vendor, alerting you when new devices appear or unknown devices connect. Features include automatic device recognition, ARP scanning, WiFi connected device tracking, online/offline notifications, device history with timestamps, webhook alerts (Discord, Telegram, etc.), and a beautiful dashboard. Perfect for home network security - know exactly what's connected to your network at all times.
usecases: Monitor your home network for new device connections.
Get alerts when unknown devices connect to your WiFi.
Track device history - when devices joined and last seen.
Identify all devices on your network with vendor recognition.
notes: Scans via ARP to discover all devices on network
Database of device history over time
